text.value: Referred for risk assessment at airport

bind.calculate: concat( concat( /traveller_surveillance/patient_age_in_years , if( /traveller_surveillance/patient_age_in_years =1,' year and ',' years and ')), concat( /traveller_surveillance/patient_age_in_months mod 12, if(( /traveller_surveillance/patient_age_in_months mod 12)=1,' month old',' months old')) )

bind.jr:constraintMsg: Date must not be in the future
Please make sure the number is not already in use by another person and is in the format +254 7XX XXX XXX or 07XX XXX XXX.
Please make sure the number is not already in use by another person and is in the format +254 7XX XXX XXX or 07XX XXX XXX.
should not be more than 45 degree centrigade

input.label: Telephone number in Kenya
input.hint: Please make sure the number is in the format +254 7XX XXX XXX or 07XX XXX XXX.

input.label: Alternate phone number
input.hint: Please make sure the number is in the format +254 7XX XXX XXX or 07XX XXX XXX.

select1.label: Are you planning to reside in Kenya for a duration exceeding 1 hour?

input.label: Please provide your contact information during your stay
Name of your contact person (if not yourself)
Telephone No of your contact person (if any)
input.hint: Please make sure the number is in the format +254 7XX XXX XXX or 07XX XXX XXX.

input.label: **Today, or in the past 24 Hours, have you had any of the following symptoms?**

select1.label: Fever (38C or higher), felt feverish or had chills?

input.label: Traveller has presented symptoms
Traveller should not be released when they've presented symptoms
Report to the nearest health facility if you experience either of these symptoms: Fever/Chills, Cough or difficult in breathing
**Fill a Case investigation form immediately after submission of this form**
**Click the Submit button at the bottom of the form.**
Case Investigation notification will be sent to the Rapid Response Team
